bug.author: Amrouane
bug.summary: I get ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified procedure could not be found when i import pandas_profiling
bug.description:
I Get the error: ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified procedure could not be found. whenever i try to import pandas_profiling I am running the code on python 3.7 with package versions: pandas== 0.24.2 pandas-profiling ==2.3.0 The error log I'm getting is: <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>ImportError Traceback (most recent call last) <ipython-input-1-dde8e3d95713> in <module> 1 import pandas as pd ----> 2 import pandas_profiling 3 import numpy as np 4 5 # importing the data
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\__init__.py in <module> 16 17 from pandas_profiling.config import config ---> 18 from pandas_profiling.controller import pandas_decorator 19 import pandas_profiling.view.templates as templates 20 from pandas_profiling.model.describe import describe as describe_df
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\controller\pandas_decorator.py in <module> 1 """This file add the decorator on the DataFrame object.""" 2 from pandas import DataFrame ----> 3 from pandas_profiling.__init__ import ProfileReport 4 5
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\__init__.py in <module> 18 from pandas_profiling.controller import pandas_decorator 19 import pandas_profiling.view.templates as templates ---> 20 from pandas_profiling.model.describe import describe as describe_df 21 from pandas_profiling.view.notebook import display_notebook_iframe 22 from pandas_profiling.view.report import to_html
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\model\describe.py in <module> 22 from pandas_profiling.model import base 23 from pandas_profiling.model.base import Variable ---> 24 from pandas_profiling.model.correlations import ( 25 calculate_correlations, 26 perform_check_correlation,
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\pandas_profiling\model\correlations.py in <module> 9 from confuse import NotFoundError 10 from pandas.core.base import DataError ---> 11 from scipy import stats 12 13 from pandas_profiling.config import config
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\stats\__init__.py in <module> 365 from __future__ import division, print_function, absolute_import 366 --> 367 from .stats import * 368 from .distributions import * 369 from .morestats import *
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\stats\stats.py in <module> 171 from scipy._lib._util import _lazywhere 172 import scipy.special as special --> 173 from . import distributions 174 from . import mstats_basic 175 from ._stats_mstats_common import _find_repeats, linregress, theilslopes, siegelslopes
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\stats\distributions.py in <module> 8 from __future__ import division, print_function, absolute_import 9 ---> 10 from ._distn_infrastructure import (entropy, rv_discrete, rv_continuous, 11 rv_frozen) 12
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\stats\_distn_infrastructure.py in <module> 22 23 # for root finding for discrete distribution ppf, and max likelihood estimation ---> 24 from scipy import optimize 25 26 # for functions of continuous distributions (e.g. moments, entropy, cdf)
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\optimize\__init__.py in <module> 385 386 from .optimize import * --> 387 from ._minimize import * 388 from ._root import * 389 from ._root_scalar import *
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\optimize\_minimize.py in <module> 28 from ._trustregion_krylov import _minimize_trust_krylov 29 from ._trustregion_exact import _minimize_trustregion_exact ---> 30 from ._trustregion_constr import _minimize_trustregion_constr 31 32 # constrained minimization
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\optimize\_trustregion_constr\__init__.py in <module> 2 3 ----> 4 from .minimize_trustregion_constr import _minimize_trustregion_constr 5 6 __all__ = ['_minimize_trustregion_constr']
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\optimize\_trustregion_constr\minimize_trustregion_constr.py in <module> 2 import time 3 import numpy as np ----> 4 from scipy.sparse.linalg import LinearOperator 5 from .._differentiable_functions import VectorFunction 6 from .._constraints import (
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\sparse\linalg\__init__.py in <module> 115 from .dsolve import * 116 from .interface import * --> 117 from .eigen import * 118 from .matfuncs import * 119 from ._onenormest import *
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\sparse\linalg\eigen\__init__.py in <module> 9 from __future__ import division, print_function, absolute_import 10 ---> 11 from .arpack import * 12 from .lobpcg import * 13
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\sparse\linalg\eigen\arpack\__init__.py in <module> 20 from __future__ import division, print_function, absolute_import 21 ---> 22 from .arpack import *
~\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\scipy\sparse\linalg\eigen\arpack\arpack.py in <module> 43 __all__ = ['eigs', 'eigsh', 'svds', 'ArpackError', 'ArpackNoConvergence'] 44 ---> 45 from . import _arpack 46 import numpy as np 47 import warnings
ImportError: DLL load failed: The specified procedure could not be found. </denchmark-code>

comments.comment:
I'm getting something similar. Can use it as import and df.profile report() to file. Can not use as external too in pycharm. Error log and installed packages below.
